typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		description as string,
		tags as (name as string)[],
		foodGroup as string,
		version as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
